metadata.title: CVE-2018-20451 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The process_file function in reader.c in libdoc through 2017-10-23 has a heap-based buffer over-read that allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: catdoc package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
